description: Lists the following prices for either all the TLDs supported by Route 53, or the specified TLD:

parameters.name: Tld
parameters.description: The TLD for which you want to receive the pricing information. For example. .net. If a Tld value is not provided, a list of prices for all TLDs supported by Route 53 is returned.

parameters.name: Marker
parameters.description: For an initial request for a list of prices, omit this element. If the number of prices that are not yet complete is greater than the value that you specified for MaxItems, you can use Marker to return additional prices. Get the value of NextPageMarker from the previous response, and submit another request that includes the value of NextPageMarker in the Marker element. Used only for all TLDs. If you specify a TLD, don't specify a Marker.

parameters.name: MaxItems
parameters.description: Number of Prices to be returned. Used only for all TLDs. If you specify a TLD, don't specify a MaxItems.

nested_items.name: Prices
nested_items.description: A complex type that includes all the pricing information. If you specify a TLD, this array contains only the pricing for that TLD.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the TLD for which the prices apply.

nested_items.name: RegistrationPrice
nested_items.description: The price for domain registration with Route 53.

nested_items.name: Price
nested_items.description: The price of a domain, in a specific currency.

nested_items.name: TransferPrice
nested_items.description: The price for transferring the domain registration to Route 53.

nested_items.name: Price
nested_items.description: The price of a domain, in a specific currency.

nested_items.name: RenewalPrice
nested_items.description: The price for renewing domain registration with Route 53.

nested_items.name: Price
nested_items.description: The price of a domain, in a specific currency.

nested_items.name: ChangeOwnershipPrice
nested_items.description: The price for changing domain ownership.

nested_items.name: Price
nested_items.description: The price of a domain, in a specific currency.

nested_items.name: RestorationPrice
nested_items.description: The price for restoring the domain with Route 53.

nested_items.name: Price
nested_items.description: The price of a domain, in a specific currency.

nested_items.name: NextPageMarker
nested_items.description: If there are more prices than you specified for MaxItems in the request, submit another request and include the value of NextPageMarker in the value of Marker.
